title: French IT giant Capgemini to sell US subsidiary after row over ICE links
summary_full: Capgemini has been in the spotlight for days over a deal its American subsidiary signed with ICE to identify foreigners and track their locations on US soil
summary_public: Capgemini has been in the spotlight for days over a deal its American subsidiary signed with ICE to identify foreigners and track their locations on US soil
